005
006package gov.nist.secauto.oscal.tools.cli.core.commands;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.commands.MetaschemaCommands;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.CLIProcessor.CallingContext;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.ExitCode;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.AbstractTerminalCommand;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.CommandExecutionException;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.DefaultExtraArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.ExtraArgument;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.ICommandExecutor;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDocumentNodeItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.DeserializationFeature;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.Format;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.IBoundLoader;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.ISerializer;
025import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.OscalBindingContext;
026import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.Catalog;
027import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.Profile;
028import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.ProfileResolutionException;
029import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.ProfileResolver;
030
031import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
032import org.apache.commons.cli.Option;
033
034import java.io.IOException;
035import java.io.PrintStream;
036import java.net.URI;
037import java.nio.file.Path;
038import java.util.Collection;
039import java.util.List;
040
041import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
042
043public abstract class AbstractResolveCommand
044    extends AbstractTerminalCommand {
045  @NonNull
046  private static final List<ExtraArgument> EXTRA_ARGUMENTS = ObjectUtils.notNull(List.of(
047      new DefaultExtraArgument("URI to resolve", true),
048      new DefaultExtraArgument("destination file", false)));
049  @NonNull
050  private static final List<Option> OPTIONS = ObjectUtils.notNull(
051      List.of(
052          MetaschemaCommands.AS_FORMAT_OPTION,
053          MetaschemaCommands.TO_OPTION,
054          MetaschemaCommands.OVERWRITE_OPTION));
055
056  @Override
057  public String getDescription() {
058    return "Resolve the specified OSCAL Profile";
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  public Collection<? extends Option> gatherOptions() {
063    return OPTIONS;
064  }
065
066  @Override
067  public List<ExtraArgument> getExtraArguments() {
068    return EXTRA_ARGUMENTS;
069  }
070
071  @SuppressWarnings({
072      "PMD.CyclomaticComplexity", "PMD.CognitiveComplexity", // reasonable
073      "PMD.PreserveStackTrace" // intended
074  })
075
076  @Override
077  public ICommandExecutor newExecutor(CallingContext callingContext, CommandLine cmdLine) {
078    return ICommandExecutor.using(callingContext, cmdLine, this::executeCommand);
079  }
080
081  @SuppressWarnings({
082      "PMD.OnlyOneReturn", // readability
083      "unused"
084  })
085  protected void executeCommand(
086      @NonNull CallingContext callingContext,
087      @NonNull CommandLine cmdLine) throws CommandExecutionException {
088    List<String> extraArgs = cmdLine.getArgList();
089
090    URI source = MetaschemaCommands.handleSource(
091        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(extraArgs.get(0)),
092        ObjectUtils.notNull(getCurrentWorkingDirectory().toUri()));
093
094    IBindingContext bindingContext = OscalBindingContext.instance();
095    IBoundLoader loader = bindingContext.newBoundLoader();
096    loader.disableFeature(DeserializationFeature.DESERIALIZE_VALIDATE_CONSTRAINTS);
097
098    // attempt to determine the format
099    Format asFormat = MetaschemaCommands.determineSourceFormat(
100        cmdLine,
101        MetaschemaCommands.AS_FORMAT_OPTION,
102        loader,
103        source);
104
105    Path destination = null;
106    if (extraArgs.size() > 1) {
107      destination = MetaschemaCommands.handleDestination(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(extraArgs.get(1)), cmdLine);
108    }
109
110    IDocumentNodeItem document;
111    try {
112      document = loader.loadAsNodeItem(asFormat, source);
113    } catch (IOException ex) {
114      throw new CommandExecutionException(
115          ExitCode.INVALID_ARGUMENTS,
116          String.format("Unable to load content '%s'. %s",
117              source,
118              ex.getMessage()),
119          ex);
120    }
121
122    Object object = document.getValue();
123    if (object == null) {
124      throw new CommandExecutionException(
125          ExitCode.INVALID_ARGUMENTS,
126          String.format("The source document '%s' contained no data.", source));
127    }
128
129    if (object instanceof Catalog) {
130      // this is a catalog
131      throw new CommandExecutionException(
132          ExitCode.INVALID_ARGUMENTS,
133          String.format("The source '%s' is already a catalog.", source));
134    }
135
136    if (!(object instanceof Profile)) {
137      // this is something else
138      throw new CommandExecutionException(
139          ExitCode.INVALID_ARGUMENTS,
140          String.format("The source '%s' is not a profile.", source));
141    }
142
143    // this is a profile
144    DynamicContext dynamicContext = new DynamicContext(document.getStaticContext());
145    dynamicContext.setDocumentLoader(loader);
146    ProfileResolver resolver = new ProfileResolver(dynamicContext);
147
148    IDocumentNodeItem resolvedProfile;
149    try {
150      resolvedProfile = resolver.resolve(document);
151    } catch (IOException | ProfileResolutionException ex) {
152      throw new CommandExecutionException(
153          ExitCode.PROCESSING_ERROR,
154          String.format("Cmd: Unable to resolve profile '%s'. %s", document.getDocumentUri(), ex.getMessage()),
155          ex);
156    }
157
158    // DefaultConstraintValidator validator = new
159    // DefaultConstraintValidator(dynamicContext);
160    // ((IBoundXdmNodeItem)resolvedProfile).validate(validator);
161    // validator.finalizeValidation();
162
163    Format toFormat = MetaschemaCommands.getFormat(cmdLine, MetaschemaCommands.TO_OPTION);
164    ISerializer<Catalog> serializer = bindingContext.newSerializer(toFormat, Catalog.class);
165    try {
166      if (destination == null) {
167        @SuppressWarnings({ "resource", "PMD.CloseResource" })
168        PrintStream stdOut = ObjectUtils.notNull(System.out);
169        serializer.serialize((Catalog) INodeItem.toValue(resolvedProfile), stdOut);
170      } else {
171        serializer.serialize((Catalog) INodeItem.toValue(resolvedProfile), destination);
172      }
173    } catch (IOException ex) {
174      throw new CommandExecutionException(ExitCode.IO_ERROR, ex);
175    }
176  }
177}
